title: All about kids
brief_description: Quebec Aquarium: School children see marine life at close range. Children’s Play Therapy: Games and handicrafts are considered an important part of a young patient’s recovery at Children’s Hospital in Winnipeg. Soccer School: British coach Trevor Churchill adds to the already active interest in this sport in British Columbia.
